
SELECT

PATH "/Message", PATH "/Severity", PATH "/EventType"

WHERE
OR(OR(OR(OFTYPE ns=1;i=5002, $4), OR($5, OFTYPE i=3035)), OR($1,$2))

FOR
$1:= OFTYPE $7
$2:= OFTYPE $8
$4:= OFTYPE ns=1;i=5003
$5:= OFTYPE ns=1;i=5004
$7:= NODEID ns=1;i=5000
$8:= ns=1;i=5001
